HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Bulk assignment of animals or Colonists to areas, outfits, drugs, masters in one single action. Setup different policies and switch at will.| HOW TO USE 1. Create a policy either for animals or for colonists by clicking the dented wheel icon 2. Select and activate a new created policy by clicking on the button next to the dented wheel icon 3. Configure the policy by setting the areas, outfits, drugs, etc as you always do 4. Done.|Repeat this process for other policies and THEN change between them in one click. WIN!
